statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 (SELECT count(*) FROM ANSIPCImpactCheck WHERE IsYuanZhuiZhuiLuo =1 AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS SUMIsYuanZhuiZhuiLuo, (SELECT count(*) FROM ANSIPCImpactCheck WHERE IsGaoSuChongJi =1 AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS SUMIsGaoSuChongJi, (SELECT count(*) FROM ANSIPCImpactCheck WHERE IsNaiRanXing =1 AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS SUMIsNaiRanXing, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCFinishCheck WHERE IsMuShiJianYan = 1 AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS SUMIsMuShiJianYan, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCFogCheck WHERE IsFogPassing = 1 AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS SUMIsFogPassing, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCOpticsCheck WHERE IsZiWaiXian = 1 AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS SUMIsZiWaiXian, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCOpticsCheck WHERE IsKeJianGuang = 1 AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS SUMIsKeJianGuang, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCPenetrateCheck WHERE IsPassing = 1 AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS SUMIsPenetrate, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCPenetrateCheck WHERE InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS mCountPenetrate, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANSIPCImpactCheck WHERE InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS mCountANSI, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCFogCheck WHERE InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS mCountFog, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCFogCheck WHERE InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS MCountOptics, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCPGPCL WHERE InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS MCountPGPCL, (SELECT count(*) FROM PCOpticsCheck WHERE InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoid# AND ProductId = #productid#) AS MCountOptics FROM ANSIPCImpactCheck
SELECT * FROM PCExportReportANSI WHERE (ExpType=#ExpType# OR #ExpType# IS NULL) AND ReportDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# $sql$ ORDER BY ExportReportId DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PCExportReportANSI WHERE ExpType=#ExpType# ORDER BY InsertTime desc
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PCExportReportANSI WHERE ExpType=#ExpType# ORDER BY InsertTime
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PCExportReportANSI WHERE InsertTime<#InsertTime# AND ExpType=#ExpType# ORDER BY InsertTime desc
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PCExportReportANSI WHERE InsertTime>#InsertTime# AND ExpType=#ExpType# ORDER BY InsertTime
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT * FROM PCExportReportANSI WHERE ExpType=#ExpType# ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
select case when exists(select * from PCExportReportANSI where InsertTime < #InsertTime# and ExpType=#ExpType#) then 1 else 0 end
select case when exists(select * from PCExportReportANSI where InsertTime > #InsertTime# and ExpType=#ExpType#) then 1 else 0 end
select *from PCExportReportANSI where ExpType=#JIS# and InvoiceCusXOId=#invoiceCusId#
